metadata.synopsis: After private detective Mike Hammer (Robert Bray) defends a prostitute (Jan Chaney) from a violent thug, she's killed in what looks like a hit-and-run accident. But her ring -- once stolen by Nazis -- is again missing. After Capt. Pat Chambers (Booth Coleman) briefs Mike, he embarks on a search to find the ring and unravel the mystery surrounding the murder. Along the way, he meets a beautiful widow, Nancy (Whitney Blake), and must confront a gang of jewel smugglers.

reviews: Mickey Spillane's copyrighted blend of sex, brutality and mystery is even less impressive than usual in this cluttered story, although Robert Bray does reasonably well as Mike Hammer, the bloodshot private eye.
tame Spillane when compared to Robert Aldrich's classic Mike Hammer noir thriller Kiss Me Deadly.
